subtitle: Filling, warming and tasty - perfect for those chilly winter evenings.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan. Fry the beef, onion and carrots together for 4-5 min until beef has browned and vegetables have softened slightly. Stir in the flour. Season to taste. Cook for 1 min.
Add the stock to the pan. Bring to the boil, stirring constantly. Simmer for 20 min, stirring frequently.
Add the pasta and beans to the pan. Cook for 5-8 min until pasta is tender. Stir in the parsley. Spoon into warmed soup bowls.

title: Hearty beef broth
